items.sentence: Do you have any idea what\'s causing the problem?
Tom couldn\'t do what we were hoping he could do.
Tom didn\'t act like he really wanted to be here.
I think I may have learned a few things from Tom.
I think Tom and Mary are both going to get fired.
Were you disappointed with how things turned out?
I don\'t know, but I bet either Tom or Mary does.
Tom got back home sooner than I thought he would.
Why are you telling me that Tom has a girlfriend?
I know that you wouldn\'t do something like that.
